text: Les Deschiens is a French-language comedy television series. It was broadcast from 1993 to 2002 on Canal + (France). == Plot == This semi-improvised series of short sketches depicts a gallery of quirky characters having arguments or selling bizarre products. ==Casting== * François Morel : M. Morel * Yolande Moreau : Yolande * Olivier Saladin : M. Saladin * Philippe Duquesne : M. Duquesne * Bruno Lochet : Bruno * Lorella Cravotta : Lorella * Olivier Broche : The son * Atmen Kelif : Atmen * Jean-Marc Bihour : Jean-Marc * Michel Robin * Fabienne Chaudat * Jean-François Dinacaroupin * François Toumarkine * Robert Horn * Yves Robin * Hervé Lassince ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 French television series debuts
title: Les Deschiens
